system.effect:
Has at least 4 legs, when calculating movement, double Agility Bonus. If the creature has more than 4 legs, Double Agility Bonus and add +2 for each additional pair of legs beyond 4 (6 legs = (ABx2)+2, 8 legs = (ABx2)+4, and so on). 
Use common sense, millipedes shouldn't be moving at the speed of sound.
